attributes.action: Petition US Government to show restraint with world conflicts, and consider the possible implications to the security of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK, considering our "special relationship" with the United States, I believe that we are being exposed to increased risks of terrorism and other attacks due to our support of recent military action in the Middle East.

The USA is clearly located at a further distance from the current conflict zones, and Middle Eastern states to the best of our knowledge do not posses the capabilities to strike the US directly, and it is increasingly difficult for them to be targeted by terrorism on home soil.
